The "mapped" version of these tests gets to use dynamic mappings. The "search request" version has to use dynamic mappings to disable the fields so that we can "prove" that we're replacing them with search requests.
I guess another option is for me to hack the search requests and issue a get mapping or field caps request before hand to try to construct the search request based on the disabled mappings that I made. I didn't have that option when I first wrote the code so I did the dynamic mapping stuff. Its kind of nasty so maybe I should replace it with that...... I'd be ok doing it now if you feel strongly about it but I'd also be ok leaving this for a while.
